title: How to Stop Syncing iPhone Contacts to iCloud

steps.title: Open the iPhone’s Settings.
steps.content: Open the iPhone’s Settings. This is the grey icon with cogs located on one of the home screens. It may also be located in the “Utilities” folder on a home screen.

steps.title: Scroll down and tap iCloud.
steps.content: Scroll down and tap iCloud . This is in the fourth set of options.

steps.title: Sign in to your iCloud account (if necessary).
steps.content: Sign in to your iCloud account (if necessary). Enter your Apple ID and password. Tap Sign in .

steps.title: Scroll down and slide the Contacts button to the Off position.
steps.content: Scroll down and slide the Contacts button to the Off position. Contacts will no longer be synced to iCloud. Any iCloud contacts not already stored on this iPhone will be removed.
